mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sk_Product( p_brand, p_product, p_intro, p_price, p_category, p_classcode, created_datetime )VALUES( #{pBrand}, #{pProduct}, #{pIntro}, #{pPrice}, #{pCategory}, #{pClassCode}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT p_no, p_brand, p_product, p_intro, p_price, p_category, p_classcode, on_sale FROM sk_Product WHERE p_no = #{pno}
